title: Larina Hallow

properties.name: description
properties.value: Larina Hallow was the daughter of the Icyene Queen Efaritay and her husband the human King Ascertes. She was killed by her father after he was turned into the vampyre Vanstrom Klause by Lord Drakan as part of his scheme of conquering Hallowvale.

content:
Larina Hallow was the daughter of the Icyene Queen Efaritay and her husband the human King Ascertes. She was killed by her father after he was turned into the vampyre Vanstrom Klause by Lord Drakan as part of his scheme of conquering Hallowvale.

During Sins of the Father, Vanescula Drakan reveals to Safalaan, that Larina was his sister and that she was killed in the conquest of Hallowvale, and that she was buried in the mausoleum at the Icyene Graveyard intended for the whole royal family of Hallowvale. During the quest's climax Vanstrom Klause reveals that he killed her without remorse, now being a vampyre removing all attachment to his former life.
rawContent:
'''Larina Hallow''' was the daughter of the [[Icyene]] [[Queen Efaritay]] and her husband the [[human]] [[King Ascertes]]. She was killed by her father after he was turned into the [[vampyre]] [[Vanstrom Klause]] by [[Lowerniel Drakan|Lord Drakan]] as part of his scheme of conquering [[Hallowvale]].

During [[Sins of the Father]], [[Vanescula Drakan]] reveals to [[Safalaan]], that Larina was his sister and that she was killed in the conquest of Hallowvale, and that she was buried in the mausoleum at the [[Icyene Graveyard]] intended for the whole royal family of Hallowvale. During the quest's climax Vanstrom Klause reveals that he killed her without remorse, now being a vampyre removing all attachment to his former life.

[[Category:Saradominists]]
[[Category:Characters that do not appear in-game]]
